result.html: Bhí óige shona agamI had a happy youth.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí óige ẛona agamI had a happy youth.

result.ga: Tá Peadar níos óige ná Darren
result.orig: Tá Peadar níos óige ná Darren
result.html: Tá Peadar níos óige ná DarrenPeadar is younger than Darren.
result.ponchtml: Tá Peadar níos óige ná DarrenPeadar is younger than Darren.

result.eng: Eithne is the youngest in the family.
result.ga: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlann
result.orig: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlann
result.html: Is í Eithne an duine is óige sa chlannEithne is the youngest in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is í Eiṫne an duine is óige sa ċlannEithne is the youngest in the family.

result.ga: Is mise an dara duine is óige
result.orig: Is mise an dara duine is óige
result.html: Is mise an dara duine is óigeI am the second youngest.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an dara duine is óigeI am the second youngest.
